content: pattern and pictures are property of andrea lea/southern hooked stitches do not share sell or claim pattern as your own do not publish in print or on the internet without written permission from andrea lea if you have questions about this pattern please email me at southerncrochetstitches@gmail com materials red heart super saver in baby pink aran and dusty grey crochet hooks size g & i safety eyes or small black buttons but i like the beady eyes ¾ inch button yarn needle for weaving in ends stitch marker optional abbreviations single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet hdc2tog = half_double_crochet 2 together double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = double_crochet 2 together chain = chain st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch nose starting with baby pink yarn and size g hook round 1 magic_ring chain 1 4 single_crochet in ring 4 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each st around changing to aran yarn at end of round 8 single_crochet face round 3 single_crochet in each st around 8 single_crochet round 4 *single_crochet in first st 2 single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 12 single_crochet note we re changing to half_double_crochet at this point round 5 half_double_crochet in each st around 12 half_double_crochet round 6 *half_double_crochet in each of first 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 16 half_double_crochet round 7 half_double_crochet in each st around 16 half_double_crochet round 8 *half_double_crochet in each of first 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 20 half_double_crochet round 9 *half_double_crochet in each of first 4 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 24 half_double_crochet round 10 *half_double_crochet in each of first 5 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 28 half_double_crochet round 11 *half_double_crochet in each of the first 6 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 32 half_double_crochet ©2021 andrea lea/southern hooked stitches round 12 *half_double_crochet in each of the first 7 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 36 half_double_crochet round 13 *half_double_crochet in each of the first 8 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 40 half_double_crochet round 14 *half_double_crochet in first st 2 half_double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 60 half_double_crochet rounds 15 17 half_double_crochet in each st around 60 half_double_crochet at the end of round 17 switch to the dusty grey yarn size i hook and we ll be using double_crochet stitches body round 18 double_crochet in next 5 sts semi deep double_crochet next 2 sts see picture very deep double_crochet next st see picture semi deep double_crochet next 2 sts double_crochet rest of the way around 60 double_crochet semi deep very deep rounds 19 27 double_crochet in each st around 60 double_crochet round 28 pouch round double_crochet in each of the next 35 sts chain
